public class JettyMicroservletFilter extends com.telenav.kivakit.component.BaseComponent implements javax.servlet.Filter, com.telenav.kivakit.core.language.trait.TryTrait, RestProblemReportingTrait
Not public API

A Java Servlet API filter that handles Microservlet REST requests.

Microservlet Mounts

Microservlets are mounted on paths with mount(RestPath, Microservlet). When doFilter(ServletRequest, ServletResponse, FilterChain) is called by the servlet implementation, the path is parsed and the associated microservlet (if any) is invoked.

All HTTP methods result in a call to Microservlet.onRespond(MicroservletRequest), where the parameter is the posted JSON object (in the case of POST requests). The object returned from the onRequest method is written to the response output in JSON format. The Gson object used to serialize and deserialize JSON objects is obtained from the RestService passed to the filter constructor.

JAR Mounts

To permit robust backwards compatibility, JAR files can be mounted with mount(MountedApi) When doFilter(ServletRequest, ServletResponse, FilterChain) is called by the servlet implementation, the path is parsed. If there is a JAR mounted on the path, it is executed in a child process (if it is not already running) using the given port for HTTP. The request is delegated to the child process' port.

Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
